description:
This app is ad supported. Please don’t download it and then leave negative reviews because it has ads in it. 
Read the classic Mother Goose nursery rhymes with your child. Over 300 rhymes, including Ba Ba Blacksheep, Three Blind Mice, Humpty Dumpty, Jack and Jill and Little Boy Blue.
All illustrations are now puzzles too! Just tap an illustration and it will turn into a slider puzzle.
Features the classic artwork illustrated by Blanche Fisher Wright.
Please send feature requests and bug reports to contact@pjnation.com
versionNote:
All illustrations are now puzzles too! Just tap an illustration and it will turn into a slider puzzle.

As requested, you change the font-size now. Use the font size tool in the top right.

Please be sure to try our other apps.

Thanks to everyone for your kind feedback and comments.
